did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Sarah Cammerstein Stern Triangle Fire Collection, 1911-1999
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Sarah Cammerstein Stern Triangle Fire Collection #6373. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Letters from Maurice Stern to Sarah Cammerstein
Affidavit for License to Marry for Maurice Stern and Sarah Cammerstein

scopecontent.p: Date of Marriage entered as December 31, 1911. Affidavit sworn on December 29, 1912.

did.unittitle: Roll of Dead in Waist Factory Fire Numbers 141; Sixty Bodies of Victims Are Still Unidentified

scopecontent.p: The New York Herald, March 27, 1911. Photocopy

did.unittitle: Twenty-Five Years Ago This Week: Triangle Waist Fire Cost 146 Lives and Caused Wide Reforms
New Safety Era Born of Fire Horror: Code of Laws a Memorial to 145 Girls Who Died In Triangle Factory Trap
Ten Minutes of Terror: Today's Stringent Work Laws Forged in Sweatshop Holocaust That Claimed 146 Lives Half Century Ago
Memories of a Fire A Half-Century Ago
March 25, 1911: The Day It Rained Burning Girls
TV Drama Brings Back Memories of Fire

scopecontent.p: Printed from www.historybuff.com/library/refshirtwaist.html on February 26, 1999. First section missing. Printed again in its entirety on February 20, 2014.
